plays.text: Penalty to Keith Carney 2 minutes for Cross checking Samuel Pahlsson

Penalty to Teemu Selanne 2 minutes for Hooking Petteri Nummelin
Penalty to Todd Marchant 2 minutes for Hooking Kurtis Foster
Penalty to Derek Boogaard 2 minutes for Kneeing Scott Niedermayer
Penalty to Derek Boogaard 5 minutes for Fighting Shane O'Brien
2 minute Bench Penalty for Instigator
Penalty to Shane O'Brien 5 minutes for Fighting Derek Boogaard
Penalty to Shane O'Brien 10 minutes for Misconduct Derek Boogaard
Goal scored by Nick Schultz assisted by Todd White AND Pierre-Marc Bouchard
Penalty to Todd Marchant 2 minutes for Hooking Todd White
Penalty to Derek Boogaard 5 minutes for Fighting Todd Fedoruk
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 5 minutes for Fighting Derek Boogaard
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 10 minutes for Misconduct Derek Boogaard
Penalty to Todd Fedoruk 2 minutes for Holding Derek Boogaard served by Corey Perry
2 minute Bench Penalty for Instigator served by Corey Perry
Penalty to Sean O'Donnell 2 minutes for Cross checking Kim Johnsson
Penalty to Mattias Weinhandl 2 minutes for Holding Rob Niedermayer
Goal scored by Brian Rolston assisted by Mikko Koivu
Goal scored by Chris Kunitz unassisted
